getTierHashes(uint256).details: It uses a EnumerableSet to store values and loops over each element to add to the array.Can be costly if calling within a contract for address with many tokens.

getTier(uint256).notice: It returns information about a Tier for an index.

getTierHashes(uint256).notice: It returns an array of token IDs owned by an address.

getTokenTier(uint256).notice: It returns information about a Tier for a token ID.
